thread.title: BRIEF-JetBlue Issues Statement Responding To Crewmembers Electing Transport Workers Union To Represent Them

title: BRIEF-JetBlue Issues Statement Responding To Crewmembers Electing Transport Workers Union To Represent Them

organizations.name: electing transport workers union to represent them reuters

text:
April 17, 2018 / 7:03 PM / Updated 7 minutes ago BRIEF-JetBlue Issues Statement Responding To Crewmembers Electing Transport Workers Union To Represent Them Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 17 (Reuters) - JetBlue Airways Corp: 
* JETBLUE - ISSUES STATEMENT IN RESPONE TO UNIONIZATION VOTE AMONG CO’S 5,000 INFLIGHT CREWMEMBERS WHO ELECTED TO HAVE TRANSPORT WORKERS UNION REPRESENT THEM 
* JETBLUE SAYS IS “DISAPPOINTED” IN RESULT OF UNIONIZATION VOTE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
